description: Authentic Mexican cuisine famous for 'Burritos as Big as Your Head' with fresh ingredients and homemade salsas.

items.name: Super Burrito
items.description: Our famous La Bamba Burrito with choice of meat, beans, lettuce, tomatoes, onion, cheese and La Bamba Hot Sauce

items.name: Regular Burrito
items.description: Classic burrito with choice of meat, beans, lettuce, tomatoes, onion, cheese and hot sauce

items.name: Mini Burrito
items.description: Smaller version of our famous burrito with same fresh ingredients

items.name: Super Nachos
items.description: Includes choice of meat, cheese, beans, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, sour cream, and salsa

items.name: Burrito Combo
items.description: Regular burrito with choice of meat, side of rice and beans, and a fountain drink

items.name: Taco Combo
items.description: Three tacos with choice of meat, side of rice and beans, and a fountain drink

items.name: Steak Taco
items.description: Corn tortilla with marinated steak, cilantro, and onions

items.name: Chicken Taco
items.description: Corn tortilla with grilled chicken, cilantro, and onions

items.name: Pork Taco
items.description: Corn tortilla with seasoned pork, cilantro, and onions

items.name: Cheese Quesadilla
items.description: Large flour tortilla filled with melted cheese

items.name: Steak Quesadilla
items.description: Large flour tortilla filled with melted cheese and marinated steak

items.name: Chicken Quesadilla
items.description: Large flour tortilla filled with melted cheese and grilled chicken

notes: All burritos available with choice of steak, chicken, pork, or vegetarian. Please specify meat preference when ordering.
